description: Indicates that a state change has occurred on the state attribute
identified by sunPlatNotificationChangedOID. As states are
enumerations of type INTEGER, the old and new states are passed in
sunPlatNotificationOldInteger and sunPlatNotificationNewInteger
respectively.
This is as defined in X.721, sec. 13.14.
REFERENCE
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatStateChange SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationEventId i 9999 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationTime s EXAMPLEE SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationObject o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationCorrelatedNotifications s EXAMPLE SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationChangedOID o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationOldInteger i 9999 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationNewInteger i 9999

description: A unique ID for this notification.
variables.name: SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationEventId

variables.name: SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationCorrelatedNotifications

description: The changed object's OBJECT IDENTIFIER value in an
attribute/state change notification.
variables.name: SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationChangedOID

description: The old INTEGER value in an attribute/state change notification.
variables.name: SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationOldInteger

description: The new INTEGER value in an attribute/state change notification.
variables.name: SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationNewInteger

description: Indicates that attribute identified by sunPlatNotificationChangedOID
has changed from the value in sunPlatNotificationOldInteger to the
value in sunPlatNotificationNewInteger.
This is as defined in X.721, sec. 13.1.
REFERENCE
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatAttributeChangeInteger SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationEventId i 9999 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationTime s EXAMPLEE SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationObject o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationCorrelatedNotifications s EXAMPLE SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationChangedOID o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationOldInteger i 9999 SUN-PLATFORM-MIB::sunPlatNotificationNewInteger i 9999
